# Test Case TC_BR141_003

## Verify invoice auto-generated for booking

| Test Case ID | Test Case Description                     | PreRequisites                                                                            | Steps | Steps to Perform                                                                                                     | Step Expected Result                                                                                  | Test Case Expected Result                            | Actual Result | Status | Note |
| ------------ | ----------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | ------------- | ------ | ---- |
| TC_BR141_003 | Verify invoice auto-generated for booking | 1. WMS application is installed<br>2. Staff is logged in<br>3. All booking data is valid | 4     | 1. Fill all required fields<br>2. Click Save button<br>3. Query Invoice table<br>4. Verify invoice linked to booking | 1. Fields filled<br>2. Booking saved<br>3. Query executed<br>4. Invoice found with matching BookingId | Invoice is auto-generated when staff creates booking |               |        |      |

---

## Test Case Details

### Basic Information

| Attribute          | Value                                    |
| ------------------ | ---------------------------------------- |
| **Test Case ID**   | TC_BR141_003                             |
| **Requirement ID** | BR141                                    |
| **Use Case**       | UC 2.1.5.2 - Create Booking for Customer |
| **Test Type**      | Functional / Processing                  |
| **Priority**       | High                                     |
| **Automation**     | Manual                                   |

### Auto-generated Invoice Fields

| Field       | Value                        |
| ----------- | ---------------------------- |
| InvoiceId   | Auto-generated               |
| BookingId   | Reference to created booking |
| TotalAmount | Booking total                |
| PaidAmount  | 0 (initial)                  |
| Status      | Unpaid                       |
| CreatedDate | Current timestamp            |

### Detailed Steps

| Step | Steps to Perform         | Step Expected Result                  |
| ---- | ------------------------ | ------------------------------------- |
| 1    | Fill all required fields | Fields filled                         |
| 2    | Click Save button        | Booking saved                         |
| 3    | Query Invoice table      | Query executed                        |
| 4    | Verify invoice linked    | Invoice found with matching BookingId |

### Pass/Fail Criteria

| Criteria          | Pass                    | Fail              |
| ----------------- | ----------------------- | ----------------- |
| Invoice created   | ✓ Invoice record exists | ✗ No invoice      |
| Linked to booking | ✓ Correct BookingId     | ✗ Wrong reference |
| Amount correct    | ✓ Matches booking total | ✗ Wrong amount    |
